p: Emulgel was obtained using cetearyl alcohol, caprylic/capric triglyceride, cimethicone, glyceryl laurate, steareth-21, steareth-2, polypropylene glycol -15 stearyl ether, butylated hydroxytoluene, butyrospermum parkii, hydrogenated lecithin, methylpropanediol, caprylyl glycol, phenylpropanol, arylates/C10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, arginine from MedaPharma/Rottapharm (Madaus spa, Monza, Italy). MTE-mp powders were obtained as described by Sansone et al. [ 9]. Other reagents used are all of pure grade.
